this_title: Thora on the Straight and Narrow Season 1
introduction: The Thora on the Straight and Narrow episodes are a four-part series that took the lads through a kind of musical pop-up-book version of Pilgrim’s Progress (with participation and commentary by beloved British actress Dame Thora Hird).From Libera Boys Choir DatabaseThora Hird presented this 4 part series which was aired in the UK 1993. The series was about a famous picture called the Broad and The Narrow Way, which depicted the scripture, Matthew chapter 7 verses 13-14.  and looked at different aspects of the picture and the scripture, with guest appearances and interviews, also featured the Angel voices, a boys choir who accompany Thora Hird throughout the series.From Peter Millward每集標題與首播日期：A Great Gulf Fixt (1993-07-04)A Thief in the Night  (1993-07-11)One Voice (1993-07-18)Public Pleasures (1993-07-25)片中歌曲:– Dies Irae– Father Hear Thy Children Call– De Profundis– One Day (Soloists: Daren Geraghty, Anthony Maher & Oliver Putland)– One Voice (Soloist: Daren Geraghty)– Footsteps in the Sand (Soloists: Glen Tilen, Daren Geraghty, Anthony Maher & Oliver Putland)– Sunday School Medley (Soloist: Daren Geraghty)– Amazing Grace (Soloists: Daren Geraghty & Oliver Putland)– Song of Joy– Day by Day– All Things Bright and Beautiful– Be Still for the Presence of the Lord (Soloists: Oliver Putland & Daren Geraghty)– Christopher Robin is Saying His Prayer (Soloists: Liam O’Kane, Glen Tilen, Anthony Maher & Oliver Putland)– Close Every Door to Me (Soloist: Daren Geraghty)– Love Lifts Us Up– How Can I Keep From Singing (Soloists: Anthony Maher, Daren Geraghty & Oliver Putland)
chinese_title: Thora on the Straight and Narrow Season 1
